title: What are some facts about Chris Brown? - Quora

response.answer_text: Birth name: Christopher Maurice Brown Birthday: Friday 5th May 1989 Birth Place: Tappahannock , Virginia, united states Parents: Mother: Joyce Hawkins, Father: Clinton Brown Siblings: Lytrel Bundy He is officially the prince of RnB ( go search up on Google: 'who is the prince of RnB?') He is 28 years old (2017) He has a daughter called Royalty Brown,3 (Birthday: 27th May 2014) Rihanna is the love of his life He got his first tattoo at 13 He lost his virginity at the age of 8 He has won an award in the past for the sexiest man alive He attended Essex high school until 2005 His favourite subject is maths His favourite dessert is strawberry cheesecake He owns a clothing line called Black Pyramid
